text: Soretomo kare-ra wa,`kare (muhanmado) wa arrā ni tsuite uso o detchiageta.' To iu no ka. Arrā ga o nozominaraba, anata no kokoro o fūjiru koto mo dekiru. Mata arrā wa, sono o kotoba ni yotte kyogi o keshi, shinri o uchitateru koto mo dekiru. Hontōni kare wa mune no naka ni daku koto o shiri tsukusa reru
